tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    theme_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    font_size SMALLINT NOT NULL,
    color_scheme VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE RobotPreferences (
    robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    voice_setting VARCHAR(255),
    movement_speed INT,
    language VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE UserPreferences (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    theme_name VARCHAR(50),
    font_size INT,
    language_code VARCHAR(5),
    accent_color VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE RobotSettings (
    robot_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    default_speed INT,
    default_language VARCHAR(5),
    voice_type VARCHAR(20),
    wake_word VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE ThemeOptions (
    theme_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    theme_name VARCHAR(50),
    font_family VARCHAR(50),
    font_color VARCHAR(10),
    background_image_url TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE LanguageSettings (
    language_code VARCHAR(5) PRIMARY KEY,
    language_name VARCHAR(50),
    region VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE VoiceSettings (
    voice_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    voice_type VARCHAR(20),
    pitch INT,
    speed INT,
    volume INT
)
